title: Hawilopar mawi Isua
lyrics:
He khawvel lungduh inthenna ramah hian,
Vanglaini ten mual an liam a;
Tahna leh lungngaihna a lo thlen lai te hian,
Min ngaih tir chatuan ram mawi chu.

Ka taksa hi lo chuai mahse,
Piallei hmun khawharah;
Famdairial changin zal mah ila,
Zion tlang mawi khi ka thlen hunah chuan,
Hawilopar mawi Isua ka hmu ang.

Thihna Jordan lui ka pelh hunah chuan,
Hmangaih lungduh then tak te nen;
Bang lo vin, aw, kan intawk leh ang a,
Hmangaihna ram mawiah chuan.
